attributes.action: Repel  Section 1 of the Occupiers Liability Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Section 1 states "that the householder owes a duty to anyone comming onto the premises, invited or not"

We implore the Government to support the right of law-abiding taxpayers to defend their home and/or family from criminals intent to commit a crime and harm against a person(s).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
